LABEL: 0x2B9
STRING: Blue sea and blue skies.

LABEL: 0x2D7
STRING: The clear air and the scent of the sea tide.

LABEL: 0x303
STRING: The sea breeze tried to desperately fight off the unbearable heat generated by the catalyst of civilization.

LABEL: 0x355
STRING: No... The mild breeze didn't relieve the heat but rather worked in tandem to intensify it.

LABEL: 0x3CB
STRING: On a certain day in August, a solemn ceremony was being held at a pier under the blazing sun that was a little too strong even for summer.

LABEL: 0x440
STRING: 「Moving on...」

LABEL: 0x462
STRING: An announcement prompted a man to come up on the stage.

LABEL: 0x4A0
STRING: After bowing to the crowd, he slowly opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x4E8
STRING: 「...Since the beginning of time, we humans have worked together with the sea.」

LABEL: 0x536
STRING: 「With Mother Sea, the source of life.」

LABEL: 0x55A
STRING: 「It is with her blessing that we have lived, nurtured our culture, and shaped our society.」

LABEL: 0x5B6
STRING: 「We can't talk about our history without including the sea and its bounty.」

LABEL: 0x606
STRING: 「Its vastness and power...」

LABEL: 0x634
STRING: 「――But sometimes, that great power strikes us.」

LABEL: 0x676
STRING: 「Mankind's history is also the history of the battle against the sea.」

LABEL: 0x6B2
STRING: 「It can hurt people and take our lives... The sea has been a threat to us from ancient times up till now.」

LABEL: 0x740
STRING: 「However, mankind has never forgotten their fascination with the deep sea!」

LABEL: 0x792
STRING: 「During the Age of Discovery, voyagers set off into the vast unknown without a care for their own safety.」

LABEL: 0x7E4
STRING: 「It has been a long time since then, and even now, when the whole world is at the palm of our hands, their spirits are not dead.」

LABEL: 0x85E
STRING: 「――The deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x878
STRING: 「We're braving that uncharted territory.」

LABEL: 0x8A0
STRING: 「It's a world filled with mysteries that fascinate us all.」

LABEL: 0x8DA
STRING: The speech continued through the echoey microphone.

LABEL: 0x910
STRING: It sounded rather unpleasant since the left and right speakers were slightly misaligned.

LABEL: 0x948
STRING: Just like how the heat of the sun searing everyone's heads was also unpleasant.

LABEL: 0x98A
STRING: And besides, the girl couldn't understand what the speaker was talking about at all――

LABEL: 0x9DC
STRING: 「*Yawn!*」

LABEL: 0xB3E
STRING: （Whoops, gotta watch myself.）

LABEL: 0xB5A
STRING: Nomura Touri swallowed a yawn and glanced around.

LABEL: 0xBB2
STRING: Fortunately, all the adults were too busy watching the ceremony while fighting the heat to notice a lone yawning high school girl.

LABEL: 0xC52
STRING: That was a close call...

LABEL: 0xC72
STRING: Since they were already standing out among all the adults, yawning with their mouth wide open would be extra embarrassing.

LABEL: 0xCE6
STRING: Touri wiped away the tears from the corners of their eyes.

LABEL: 0xD12
STRING: They tried putting extra pressure to it, but it just ended up hurting and didn't help with the sleepiness at all.

LABEL: 0xD62
STRING: This was going to be a tough one to get through, Touri thought.

LABEL: 0xDD5
STRING: Touri recalled the end-of-school ceremony just a week ago.

LABEL: 0xE11
STRING: They ended up falling asleep standing up and were brought to the infirmary by a classmate who thought they were sick.

LABEL: 0xE7D
STRING: Touri was so embarrassed since they were proud of their healthy body, which was usually fighting fit even if hit by multiple days of rain...

LABEL: 0xF1F
STRING: If they fell asleep now, it would be the school ceremony all over again.

LABEL: 0xF63
STRING: Touri had to get a grip.

LABEL: 0xF7F
STRING: Touri pinched the back of their hand as hard as they could and listened to the man up on the platform.

LABEL: 0xFE3
STRING: ...They really didn't get it.

LABEL: 0x1009
STRING: How could someone go on and on forever about something no one cared about... It seemed to be a common trait among that age group.

LABEL: 0x10F4
STRING: 「There are an unlimited number of deep-sea themed fantasies.」

LABEL: 0x1148
STRING: 「Many among them feature our interactions with the unknown lifeforms living in its depths.」

LABEL: 0x11AA
STRING: The man holding the now outdated stand microphone wiped away the sweat from his face and continued even more passionately.

LABEL: 0x1220
STRING: The never-ending speech was like a confusion spell from an RPG.

LABEL: 0x126F
STRING: Like an afternoon class in July, the girl was fighting a lonely battle against sleepiness.

LABEL: 0x12A8
STRING: It was the start of Touri's summer vacation, so how did they end up here...?

LABEL: 0x12EE
STRING: Touri hung their head.

LABEL: 0x130A
STRING: Touri was trying to piece together their hazy memories in their dazed state.

LABEL: 0x13F4
STRING: Less than two weeks ago, Touri's twin sister had visited them with a ticket.

LABEL: 0x143F
STRING: It wasn't that the sisters didn't get along well, but it was rare for the younger sister to approach Touri on their own.

LABEL: 0x14B1
STRING: But... a ticket for a submarine...?

LABEL: 0x14DB
STRING: They wondered if their sister remembered the time they'd casually mentioned wanting to ride one someday.

LABEL: 0x1543
STRING: But why now, all of a sudden?

LABEL: 0x1565
STRING: How did they get a ticket?

LABEL: 0x158B
STRING: There were a lot of unanswered questions...

LABEL: 0x15FA
STRING: But... Touri's sister hardly ever talked to them.

LABEL: 0x1630
STRING: Even on a good day, Touri didn't know what their sister was thinking, so naturally, they were confused.

LABEL: 0x168E
STRING: They tried to explain to the institute that it was a trip, but since their sister hadn't told them any details, getting a permission was hard.

LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: Touri managed to get the permission in the end thanks to their natural virtue.

LABEL: 0x174C
STRING: When Touri asked their sister more about it, they had just said, "No comment."

LABEL: 0x177E
STRING: However, all their worries were wiped away once they thought that their wonderful sister had just invited them to a trip together.

LABEL: 0x17EA
STRING: And if the submarine was chosen as the destination because of what Touri had said, that made them even happier.

LABEL: 0x1856
STRING: How many years had it been now...?

LABEL: 0x1874
STRING: Since they went on a trip together?

LABEL: 0x1896
STRING: Touri began to bask in the warm memories of their distant past――

LABEL: 0x1976
STRING: （――No, I have to stop.）

LABEL: 0x199E
STRING: They almost fell asleep and slapped themself on the cheeks.

LABEL: 0x19E8
STRING: Touri looked around, trying to fight off the sleepiness while blinking their eyes.

LABEL: 0x1A2E
STRING: There were only adults around them.

LABEL: 0x1A52
STRING: No matter how hard Touri looked, they couldn't find anyone in their age group.

LABEL: 0x1A94
STRING: Just this morning, they heard that the attendees would mostly be people involved with the project.

LABEL: 0x1AE8
STRING: Touri had thought that the fact that they were invited must have meant that more than half would be just ordinary people like them.

LABEL: 0x1B5E
STRING: That naive hope was shattered the instant Touri arrived at the pier.

LABEL: 0x1BA6
STRING: Everyone, besides a minimal number of journalists, seemed to be people involved with the project.

LABEL: 0x1C22
STRING: It was a major project that had been included in the national budget.

LABEL: 0x1C5E
STRING: The number of people involved must have been... Touri didn't even want to think about it.

LABEL: 0x1C9C
STRING: The thought made Touri feel even more out of place.

LABEL: 0x1CE4
STRING: They'd heard that their sister was somehow involved with the project, but Touri wondered how exactly?

LABEL: 0x1D4C
STRING: There was no one around who looked as anxious about the ceremony as Touri.

LABEL: 0x1DA6
STRING: They could feel the occasional sidelong glance since the ceremony began, but no one had confronted them directly yet.

LABEL: 0x1E0E
STRING: （Aargh! I don't like this!）

LABEL: 0x1E2C
STRING: Touri shook their head.

LABEL: 0x1E50
STRING: There was no point in them being so negative on an occasion like this.

LABEL: 0x1E8A
STRING: It was entirely the fault of that never-ending speech.

LABEL: 0x1EB8
STRING: It was the same with the school ceremony. "Why do I keep getting my hopes up," they pondered.

LABEL: 0x1F24
STRING: Touri sighed.

LABEL: 0x1FCE
STRING: The sun continued to shine.

LABEL: 0x1FF0
STRING: While wiping the sweat from their forehead with a handkerchief, Touri suddenly thought of something.

LABEL: 0x202A
STRING: They wondered if their frail sister would collapse in this heat.

LABEL: 0x206E
STRING: Touri tried looking to their side where their sister should've been.

LABEL: 0x20AE
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x20C6
STRING: A loud audio feedback reverberated from the platform.

LABEL: 0x2112
STRING: 「The entry into this other universe will be a new page in mankind's history!」

LABEL: 0x2169
STRING: 「I hereby announce the launch of the deep sea cruise submarine, the <SHEEP III>!」

LABEL: 0x23B0
STRING: <SHEEP III>...?

LABEL: 0x2532
STRING: The sound of the name and the English letters had quickly grabbed the girl's, Hikari's, attention.

LABEL: 0x2590
STRING: Every time they came across a new piece of information about it on the web, their interest and expectations grew.

LABEL: 0x2639
STRING: But that was all it was.

LABEL: 0x2659
STRING: Hikari only thought, "I don't understand what this is, but it seems cool."

LABEL: 0x26C3
STRING: It was the same kind of elation you might feel when reading an article about space colonies or orbital lifts.

LABEL: 0x2727
STRING: 「That's amazing...」

LABEL: 0x2743
STRING: 「It's so cool...」

LABEL: 0x2763
STRING: 「I'm sure one day...」

LABEL: 0x277B
STRING: 「Before long...」

LABEL: 0x2795
STRING: It was a longing like a soap bubble that was ready to burst.

LABEL: 0x2802
STRING: Coming here today had been a big decision for Hikari, who was still young and had problems with their health.

LABEL: 0x2868
STRING: They had decided to board for one reason only.

LABEL: 0x28B2
STRING: Halfway through the launch ceremony unfolding before them, they turned their attention to "her."

LABEL: 0x2946
STRING: A lively and pretty girl.

LABEL: 0x2970
STRING: Perhaps they were tired of the lengthy speech as they rubbed their eyes. Seeing it brought a smile to Hikari's face.

LABEL: 0x29CA
STRING: ――Hikari's sister.

LABEL: 0x29E4
STRING: Hikari was glad they decided to come here after all.

LABEL: 0x2A0A
STRING: It was worth all the effort, they thought.

LABEL: 0x2A3C
STRING: The thought of being able to talk to their sister, even for a moment, made Hikari's heart flutter.

LABEL: 0x2A8C
STRING: At that moment.

LABEL: 0x2AA4
STRING: They turned to look at Hikari, and their eyes met.

LABEL: 0x2B47
STRING: （Oh no, my heart wasn't ready for that!）

LABEL: 0x2B92
STRING: Hikari looked away reflexively.

LABEL: 0x2BBA
STRING: Afterward came the regret.

LABEL: 0x2BD4
STRING: （Wasn't it pretty blatant how I averted my eyes just now?）

LABEL: 0x2C1E
STRING: Their mind was racing all over the place.

LABEL: 0x2C56
STRING: （...Now that I think about it, I don't have to worry about things like that.）

LABEL: 0x2CCB
STRING: When Hikari glanced back at them after calming down, the girl was already staring at the submarine again.

LABEL: 0x2D1D
STRING: They let out a sigh of relief.

LABEL: 0x2D39
STRING: Hikari tried to follow their lead and looked forward, but their mind was already on the voyage after the ceremony.

LABEL: 0x2D8B
STRING: They were told only a minimum number of staff and a few project members would be on board.

LABEL: 0x2DEF
STRING: It wasn't only the current situation that was making Hikari lose their composure.

LABEL: 0x2E47
STRING: Since getting a ticket here had been a big deal, you couldn't blame them for feeling a bit uncomfortable.

LABEL: 0x2EB1
STRING: They wondered if their sister felt the same way.

LABEL: 0x2EFD
STRING: Hikari felt a bit bad about it, if they had to say.

LABEL: 0x2F25
STRING: They chuckled again by themself.

LABEL: 0x2F53
STRING: But no one else heard their little laugh.

LABEL: 0x3029
STRING: The sun shined brightly while the presentation about the submarine's performance was being held.

LABEL: 0x3081
STRING: Hikari gave up on listening to the details of its navigation system and water depth as soon as it started.

LABEL: 0x30F5
STRING: Instead, they closed their eyes, and in the darkness...

LABEL: 0x3131
STRING: They put their hands together and prayed.

LABEL: 0x31C1
STRING: （――I pray that this voyage will be a happy one for us all.）

LABEL: 0x320F
STRING: Even if they hardly knew any of the people there.

LABEL: 0x3327
STRING: （Oh, right!）

LABEL: 0x333D
STRING: Hikari looked around for a certain person.

LABEL: 0x336F
STRING: There was one more person they had thought of.

LABEL: 0x339B
STRING: The one who arranged the ticket for Hikari.

LABEL: 0x33D1
STRING: In a way, they were Hikari's patron.

LABEL: 0x340B
STRING: ――A "genius."

LABEL: 0x3427
STRING: Yes, that was what they were called.

LABEL: 0x3459
STRING: Hikari's eyes lit up while thinking about them.

LABEL: 0x3487
STRING: They might be able to meet with them.

LABEL: 0x34B1
STRING: There was so much Hikari wanted to talk about with them.

LABEL: 0x34DB
STRING: That "genius" should be here at the launch ceremony as well.

LABEL: 0x3575
STRING: ――But where on earth were they?

LABEL: 0x379E
STRING: Ice was melting.

LABEL: 0x37B8
STRING: Far in the distance, in someone's glass, making an elegant sound.

LABEL: 0x37F4
STRING: The waves were swaying.

LABEL: 0x380E
STRING: Repeatedly flowing kinetic energy. The potential of the splashes.

LABEL: 0x397C
STRING: Unconsciously filtering out everything but the refreshing sounds, Saihouji Tokiwa was thinking about the sea.

LABEL: 0x39F4
STRING: The sea.

LABEL: 0x3A06
STRING: Its composition was different from organic salt water.

LABEL: 0x3A2E
STRING: Like that stuff sprayed from a tube.

LABEL: 0x3A48
STRING: Something caught Tokiwa's eye.

LABEL: 0x3A5E
STRING: A one-piece dress, and was that a white clover on it?

LABEL: 0x3A96
STRING: White suited the sea well.

LABEL: 0x3ABA
STRING: Especially today's blue summer sea.

LABEL: 0x3AE8
STRING: Something else had stood out to them.

LABEL: 0x3B02
STRING: It was a girl sitting on the breakwater, waving their hand.

LABEL: 0x3B7D
STRING: Tokiwa assumed their point of view and looked back at themself from there.

LABEL: 0x3BC3
STRING: （Does a kimono with a calm color scheme and big patterns like this really suit the sea?）

LABEL: 0x3C19
STRING: The girl smiled.

LABEL: 0x3C42
STRING: 「It does if you ask me.」

LABEL: 0x3C9C
STRING: Tokiwa opened their eyes.

LABEL: 0x3CBE
STRING: Vaguely aware that they were still on land, they closed them again.

LABEL: 0x3D57
STRING: Despite being in the middle of the ceremony, Tokiwa spread their arms like a sail and took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x3DBB
STRING: The smell of the sea.

LABEL: 0x3DD3
STRING: The scent of the tide.

LABEL: 0x3DEB
STRING: Overlapping signifiant and signifie waveforms.

LABEL: 0x3E21
STRING: Again and again, Tokiwa took deep and slow breaths.

LABEL: 0x3E98
STRING: From an outside perspective, their unrestrained behavior stood out in the crowd, but few paid attention to it.

LABEL: 0x3F08
STRING: There were men in black surrounding Tokiwa on all sides, shielding them from the eyes of others.

LABEL: 0x3F6C
STRING: That was the rule.

LABEL: 0x3F88
STRING: The function she bore.

LABEL: 0x3FB4
STRING: The result.

LABEL: 0x3FCC
STRING: Yes, the result.

LABEL: 0x3FEA
STRING: The one who enjoyed the result won.

LABEL: 0x4012
STRING: What was a win?

LABEL: 0x402A
STRING: Conversely, what was a loss?

LABEL: 0x404A
STRING: There was a cough.

LABEL: 0x4062
STRING: The ferryman turned around.

LABEL: 0x4080
STRING: Clinking of glasses could be heard again.

LABEL: 0x40A4
STRING: It was the sound of a woman gulping down orange juice.

LABEL: 0x40DA
STRING: That seemed nice to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x40F0
STRING: （Let's drink some orange juice after we make it to the sea.）

LABEL: 0x4133
STRING: 「Let's do precisely that.」

LABEL: 0x4191
STRING: They nodded to themself.

LABEL: 0x41AB
STRING: The hour hand of the clock overlapped the minute hand.

LABEL: 0x41CD
STRING: The girl was invisible to everyone around her.

LABEL: 0x41F1
STRING: 「――The history of submarines is inseparable from that of military submarines.」

LABEL: 0x42A6
STRING: Those words interrupted Tokiwa's thoughts, and they remembered a ceremony was taking place.

LABEL: 0x42FC
STRING: （That's right.）

LABEL: 0x4316
STRING: In order to go to the sea, there were preparations beforehand.

LABEL: 0x434E
STRING: All of that was totally boring to them.

LABEL: 0x436E
STRING: But just a little longer, and Tokiwa would be able to go to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x43AA
STRING: They wondered what they'd be able to hear there.

LABEL: 0x43D6
STRING: Who, where, and what would they see?

LABEL: 0x440E
STRING: Tokiwa's unending interest in the deep sea made them more excited than ever.

LABEL: 0x44B9
STRING: They could go to the sea.

LABEL: 0x44D3
STRING: That was why they were brought here.

LABEL: 0x44FD
STRING: （How nice.）

LABEL: 0x4529
STRING: Maybe this kind of coincidence was a reward for all their hard work.

LABEL: 0x456B
STRING: Just a coincidence, they thought.

LABEL: 0x4595
STRING: Tokiwa believed in coincidences enough to thank a God they didn't believe in.

LABEL: 0x45D9
STRING: But only this once, to be certain.

LABEL: 0x4637
STRING: They didn't know.

LABEL: 0x4655
STRING: They knew but forgot.

LABEL: 0x4683
STRING: They chose to forget.

LABEL: 0x46AB
STRING: It was information from the past that was already worthless to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x46EF
STRING: But for the men who surrounded, protected, and supervised her, and for their superiors, it was a reality that couldn't be forgotten.

LABEL: 0x476B
STRING: This was a natural compensation.

LABEL: 0x478D
STRING: But for the girl who had been held captive and had contributed immensely to the <SHEEP III> project, it was a small price to pay.

LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: The girl laughed――

LABEL: 0x4A4D
STRING: The launch ceremony was proceeding slowly into the second half of the program.

LABEL: 0x4AA1
STRING: This was all part of a major submarine project in which the Japanese government was heavily involved.

LABEL: 0x4AEB
STRING: Taking that into account, the unveiling ceremony was surprisingly small.

LABEL: 0x4C6F
STRING: Hiragino Sousuke had been suspicious about the ceremony since it was first outlined.

LABEL: 0x4CDD
STRING: On the day of the ceremony, only a few experts and politicians were invited to make it seem more natural.

LABEL: 0x4D39
STRING: They didn't think anyone besides them felt this was all a bit out of place.

LABEL: 0x4D79
STRING: How many people would there be left if you were to take out the people involved with the project?

LABEL: 0x4DC5
STRING: Even the journalists here were all under the organization's thumb.

LABEL: 0x4DF9
STRING: It felt like they were afraid of showcasing this to the world.

LABEL: 0x4E4B
STRING: （There's got to be something more to it...）

LABEL: 0x4E83
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x4E9B
STRING: Their attention shifted as they played with something in their chest pocket.

LABEL: 0x4EE5
STRING: They were attending the ceremony from the shade, a step away from the crowd.

LABEL: 0x4F39
STRING: Hiragino thought the other's lack of concern for their own health was commendable, standing there in the blistering heat.

LABEL: 0x4F8D
STRING: However, what was bothering them right now wasn't the heat.

LABEL: 0x4FF3
STRING: Hiragino was looking in the opposite direction, to where the submarine was floating.

LABEL: 0x5045
STRING: However, what they were looking at was not the ship in front of them.

LABEL: 0x507B
STRING: Beyond the submarine,

LABEL: 0x50F6
STRING: there were countless white windmills.

LABEL: 0x511C
STRING: Their three blades slowly rotated in the wind.

LABEL: 0x5152
STRING: They were out in the calm sea amid the gently swaying waves.

LABEL: 0x5180
STRING: The machines that converted wind's kinetic energy into electricity marked the passage of time with their gentle rhythm.

LABEL: 0x51E4
STRING: You could call them elegant, with how there was more emphasis on their appearance than practicality.

LABEL: 0x5234
STRING: But it wasn't the elegant windmills Hiragino was looking at either.

LABEL: 0x52D1
STRING: Instead, it was the long bridge running over the horizon―the Kurama Bay Aqualine.

LABEL: 0x5323
STRING: Hiragino's eyes focused on it.

LABEL: 0x5349
STRING: It was hard to see from the pier because of the distance, but the sophisticated design of the bridge was stunning despite its history.

LABEL: 0x53C3
STRING: It had broken down in the past and was rebuilt afterward.

LABEL: 0x53EB
STRING: Destruction and creation were called rebirth.

LABEL: 0x5411
STRING: Despite arguments from both sides, a completely new design was chosen during the rebuilding.

LABEL: 0x545F
STRING: That might have been the right choice.

LABEL: 0x547F
STRING: There was no need to remind people of the events many would rather forget.

LABEL: 0x54D1
STRING: Hiragino glared at the Aqualine.

LABEL: 0x5501
STRING: As if to burn the image into their mind.

LABEL: 0x552D
STRING: Or to burn it down with their mind.

LABEL: 0x5563
STRING: As if writing over the past with the present.

LABEL: 0x558B
STRING: Or to write over the present with the past.

LABEL: 0x561A
STRING: （...How thoughtless.）

LABEL: 0x5638
STRING: They lowered their eyelids.

LABEL: 0x56B9
STRING: Hiragino looked toward the stage in front of them apologetically.

LABEL: 0x56E7
STRING: They were only attending this ceremony out of duty.

LABEL: 0x571F
STRING: Did they really have no choice but to attend?

LABEL: 0x5755
STRING: Should they run away?

LABEL: 0x5769
STRING: Or...

LABEL: 0x5781
STRING: The cross hanging on their chest shone in the sun.

LABEL: 0x57B3
STRING: Hiragino entangled the strap around their fingers and put it into their chest pocket without thinking.

LABEL: 0x57F1
STRING: As they pushed their deep anguish into their tightly clenched fist, a more realistic unease assailed Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x584B
STRING: 「If you're boarding today, please move over there and follow the staff's instructions.」

LABEL: 0x589B
STRING: As the announcement was made, Hiragino looked over the ceremony grounds and caught sight of a particular person.

LABEL: 0x5927
STRING: They frowned while staring at one of their colleagues suspiciously.

LABEL: 0x5B66
STRING: After the long preamble, the announcement that boarding would start brought the people on the pier to life.

LABEL: 0x5BCA
STRING: The summer sky filled with anticipation.

LABEL: 0x5BF0
STRING: Some in the crowd tried to contain their excitement while others shouted joyfully.

LABEL: 0x5C58
STRING: All the attendants were busy dealing with the situation and struggled to keep the smiles on their faces.

LABEL: 0x5CA4
STRING: During all that commotion, there was one person with a sour look on their face.

LABEL: 0x5E08
STRING: There was a small figure among the uniformed attendants.

LABEL: 0x5E56
STRING: For Momoi Yukari, this voyage would be their first mission.

LABEL: 0x5EAC
STRING: They were quite young, but their small physique made them look even more so.

LABEL: 0x5EFE
STRING: At the age of 28, they had volunteered and were appointed as the chief attendant of <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x5F55
STRING: The <SHEEP III> was an automated submarine navigated by an autopilot AI, so there was no "captain," so to speak.

LABEL: 0x5FBE
STRING: In other words, they were the de-facto head of all the crew.

LABEL: 0x6018
STRING: Yukari carried with them a lot of responsibility and determination.

LABEL: 0x6040
STRING: They closed their eyes and thought about the days leading to this day, trying to remain calm.

LABEL: 0x60DD
STRING: （...It's okay.）

LABEL: 0x60F7
STRING: （I've worked harder than anyone for this day.）

LABEL: 0x6131
STRING: （I have the confidence.）

LABEL: 0x614B
STRING: （I won't let anyone complain.）

LABEL: 0x6171
STRING: （I will carry out my duties―for their sake too.）

LABEL: 0x61D2
STRING: After opening their eyes, Yukari started looking for someone.

LABEL: 0x621E
STRING: Someone very important to them.

LABEL: 0x6268
STRING: Yukari wasn't here just because this was a brand-new ship or because they were chasing results.

LABEL: 0x62E0
STRING: Behind their obsession with the <SHEEP III> were strong feelings toward a single person.

LABEL: 0x6374
STRING: If only they could have been here.

LABEL: 0x63A6
STRING: For a moment, Yukari dreamed of such an unlikely possibility.

LABEL: 0x63DC
STRING: 「We are now ready to start boarding!」

LABEL: 0x642F
STRING: They were surprised by the sudden announcement.

LABEL: 0x645D
STRING: （...That wasn't good.）

LABEL: 0x6479
STRING: They couldn't get lost in their own thoughts.

LABEL: 0x64B3
STRING: Yukari was going to be in charge of this submarine.

LABEL: 0x64EB
STRING: They couldn't face everyone who entrusted this mission to them like this.

LABEL: 0x6535
STRING: Shaking their head from side to side, Yukari looked forward.

LABEL: 0x656F
STRING: In front of them were all the passengers and crew, about 50 people in total.

LABEL: 0x65A5
STRING: Their lives were in Yukari's hands.

LABEL: 0x6607
STRING: And before them was the pure white submarine they were all waiting to board.

LABEL: 0x6864
STRING: There was only one program left in the ceremony.

LABEL: 0x689C
STRING: People were basking under the blazing summer sun.

LABEL: 0x68C2
STRING: Their expectations served only to increase their enthusiasm.

LABEL: 0x68EE
STRING: The waves of people were slowly moving forward...%N

LABEL: 0x6969
STRING: Yes, boarding had begun.

LABEL: 0x6991
STRING: They were a bit behind schedule, but it was probably within the margin of error.

LABEL: 0x69D7
STRING: Nearly half of the people from the earlier ceremony were waiting in line and boarding the submarine one by one.

LABEL: 0x6A2D
STRING: Boarding proceeded slowly because bringing electronic devices on board was forbidden.

LABEL: 0x6A8F
STRING: People took their personal and wearable devices out of their luggage and handed them over to the attendants.

LABEL: 0x6B25
STRING: Going through the gate was a similar process to boarding an airplane.

LABEL: 0x6B67
STRING: People were chatting, laughing, and buzzing with anticipation and excitement.

LABEL: 0x6BA7
STRING: It was a happy and peaceful scene.

LABEL: 0x6C3C
STRING: And yet...

LABEL: 0x6C56
STRING: They wondered why.

LABEL: 0x6C70
STRING: Watching from afar, Katagiri Hitose felt an inexplicable sense of unease.

LABEL: 0x6DA6
STRING: A scene flickered inside Hitose's mind.

LABEL: 0x6DD6
STRING: In the days leading up to the launch of the <SHEEP III>, they had seen nightmares every night.

LABEL: 0x6E1F
STRING: Scenes they couldn't forget.

LABEL: 0x6E4D
STRING: A flashback of countless voices assaulting the back of their eyelids.

LABEL: 0x6EED
STRING: "The worst accident in"

LABEL: 0x6F1A
STRING: That was impossible.

LABEL: 0x6F49
STRING: "Unable to rescue"

LABEL: 0x6F74
STRING: There was no reason to worry.

LABEL: 0x6FA8
STRING: "The survivors――"

LABEL: 0x6FD7
STRING: It was different this time.

LABEL: 0x6FF5
STRING: Everything was different from back then.

LABEL: 0x7027
STRING: They told themself that and shook their head to dispel the illusion.

LABEL: 0x706B
STRING: How many times had it been in the last few days?

LABEL: 0x7097
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, they were way too nervous.

LABEL: 0x70C5
STRING: They could do nothing about it now, but Hitose couldn't help but worry.

LABEL: 0x710D
STRING: They were overthinking it.

LABEL: 0x7135
STRING: Nevertheless, that was a bad habit of theirs.

LABEL: 0x71BE
STRING: Muttering to themself, Hitose looked up.

LABEL: 0x71E8
STRING: The sweat running down their neck was not due to the heat.

LABEL: 0x7218
STRING: Hitose restrained their trembling hand.

LABEL: 0x7248
STRING: （It's going to be okay.）

LABEL: 0x725E
STRING: （I simulated it through many times.）

LABEL: 0x7296
STRING: （There's enough experimental data.）

LABEL: 0x72B8
STRING: （The weather and the conditions of the planned route are the best one could hope for.）

LABEL: 0x7306
STRING: （What's there to fear? ...Yes, this is going to be just a normal pleasure cruise.）

LABEL: 0x7352
STRING: They forced a smile on their face.

LABEL: 0x7374
STRING: Now somewhat at ease, Hitose looked again at the passengers as they boarded.

LABEL: 0x7425
STRING: （At last, huh?）

LABEL: 0x7441
STRING: They silently closed their eyes.

LABEL: 0x7467
STRING: （There will be no problems.）

LABEL: 0x7481
STRING: （It will be a wonderful voyage.）

LABEL: 0x74A5
STRING: （――That much should be obvious.）

LABEL: 0x74C5
STRING: ...They didn't know it yet, but...

LABEL: 0x74EB
STRING: The ship was about to be boarded by someone who they never expected.

LABEL: 0x753D
STRING: "His" turn to board was approaching.

LABEL: 0x76FC
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x772C
STRING: After giving a nod to a familiar face, "he" joined the line headed for the boarding gate.

LABEL: 0x7774
STRING: "He" tried his best to suppress the smile on his face while listening to the voices of the people in front of him.

LABEL: 0x77E2
STRING: "He" was fairly confident that he was the most elated person out of everyone there.

LABEL: 0x783A
STRING: （Oh, it's been so, so long.）

LABEL: 0x785C
STRING: "He" closed his eyes and faced up toward the sky.

LABEL: 0x788A
STRING: It was summer.

LABEL: 0x789E
STRING: This was the seventh summer since then.

LABEL: 0x78BF
STRING: When "he" thought about the days gone by, the hour-long launch ceremony was nothing.

LABEL: 0x7910
STRING: Determination filled "his" heart.

LABEL: 0x7946
STRING: The question "he" had been asking himself for the last seven years would finally be answered.

LABEL: 0x7983
STRING: Even the summer sun felt cold compared to that feeling.

LABEL: 0x7A1E
STRING: So...

LABEL: 0x7A34
STRING: The next few hours.

LABEL: 0x7A54
STRING: It was no exaggeration to say that this was what the last seven years had all been leading up to.

LABEL: 0x7AA5
STRING: It was time to finally reveal the truth.

LABEL: 0x7B36
STRING: Approaching the gate, "he" took out a boarding ticket.

LABEL: 0x7B78
STRING: An invitation, which was handed out to only a select few people, could be exchanged for one.

LABEL: 0x7BBC
STRING: The electronic card with the submarine's logo on it was called a boarding ticket, but apparently, it served mainly as a keycard.

LABEL: 0x7C38
STRING: The name field was blank.

LABEL: 0x7C54
STRING: In it, "he" entered――

LABEL: 0x7E57
STRING: 「A moment, please.」

LABEL: 0x7E81
STRING: Several attendants stopped "him" as he was passing through the gate.

LABEL: 0x7EC1
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x7EDF
STRING: 「It seems like you still have some electronic devices in your luggage...」

LABEL: 0x7F21
STRING: 「Hmm? Oh!」

LABEL: 0x7F41
STRING: "He" hurriedly opened his carry-on bag and took out a tablet.

LABEL: 0x7F8F
STRING: 「You must mean this, right...?」

LABEL: 0x7FAF
STRING: 「Thank you for your cooperation. We'll take good care of it...」

LABEL: 0x7FFD
STRING: The attendant looked down at the tablet.

LABEL: 0x8047
STRING: 「...Katagiri Hitoha-sama.」

LABEL: 0x8067
STRING: The attendant read the name engraved on the leather case.

LABEL: 0x80AD
STRING: 「Please take care.」

LABEL: 0x80DF
STRING: 「Have a great voyage!」

LABEL: 0x8101
STRING: With a smile on "his" face, he went back to the queue.

LABEL: 0x8149
STRING: The name engraved on the leather case――

LABEL: 0x8175
STRING: 「...Katagiri-sama? Is that correct?」

LABEL: 0x81B3
STRING: 「Ah, no, that's...」

LABEL: 0x81D9
STRING: For a moment, "he" looked flustered and stammered but soon calmed down and smiled.

LABEL: 0x8231
STRING: 「That's something I borrowed from a friend, you see.」

LABEL: 0x8267
STRING: 「Ah! My apologies.」

LABEL: 0x829B
STRING: The attendant compared the name with the one "he" had entered and bowed their head.

LABEL: 0x82D5
STRING: Just as "he" was about to return to the queue...

LABEL: 0x8309
STRING: 「Excuse me! Um... You aren't allowed to bring in food either.」

LABEL: 0x8350
STRING: The attendant was holding a chicken sandwich in their hand.

LABEL: 0x838A
STRING: 「That's a shame...」

LABEL: 0x83B2
STRING: He returned to the queue with a sad expression on "his" face.

LABEL: 0x8400
STRING: The name engraved on the leather case was...

LABEL: 0x842C
STRING: 「...Katagiri-sama? Is that correct?」

LABEL: 0x846A
STRING: 「Ah, no, that's...」

LABEL: 0x8490
STRING: For a moment, "he" looked flustered and stammered but soon calmed down and smiled.

LABEL: 0x84E8
STRING: 「That's something I borrowed from a friend, you see.」

LABEL: 0x851E
STRING: 「Ah! My apologies.」

LABEL: 0x8552
STRING: The attendant compared the name with the one "he" had entered and bowed, and "he" returned to the queue.

LABEL: 0x85B9
STRING: 「Now then, may I have your attention, please?」

LABEL: 0x85E1
STRING: Once all the passengers had boarded the submarine, a small axe was handed to the chairman of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x8645
STRING: The journalists' cameras focused on his hands.

LABEL: 0x8681
STRING: The passengers were also watching from the submarine's observation deck.

LABEL: 0x8739
STRING: The axe severed the rope.

LABEL: 0x875D
STRING: Paper flowers filled the air.

LABEL: 0x8779
STRING: Balloons went flying.

LABEL: 0x8795
STRING: The fanfare that was playing might have been just a recording, but it was enough to serve as a performance.

LABEL: 0x87D9
STRING: The submarine slowly slid out toward the sea.

LABEL: 0x8801
STRING: The red and white tape surrounding the hull peeled away to reveal the details of the ship.

LABEL: 0x8873
STRING: It consisted of two white spheres, far from what you would think when picturing a typical submarine.

LABEL: 0x88BC
STRING: And...

LABEL: 0x88D6
STRING: The letters "SHEEP III" were painted on the hull.

LABEL: 0x890D
STRING: Accompanied by a thunderous applause, the submarine slid out to sea, carrying everyone's hopes and dreams...
